resources.string: For this app to work, we need to access your camera. That cool?
Are you sure? You\'ll miss what this awesome app has to show you
Watch out!! You\'re pretty near of another person who can be infected. Please, keep the social distancing!/n Device detected:
OK! You won\'t be able to receive location based alerts

Coronavirus is thought to spread from person to person. A person can become infected through close contact and respiratory droplets that come out of our mouth or nose (i.e. when we cough, sneeze, split or talk). We are all responsible for preventing this!
Hold your phone in front of you while you move around. It will show you your \'spreading area\'. Within that area, the risk of getting infected or infecting others is higher
When a person gets inside your \'spreading area\', you are too close. Your phone will notify you of that so you can move away.
